conbody.p: (n) Contracting officers may include a provision substantially the same as the provision at 5652.215-9007 , Bill of Materials, in solicitations requiring cost analysis and the Contracting Officer wants offerors to submit a consolidated bill of materials.

(o) Contracting officers may include a provision substantially the same as the provision at 5652.215-9010 , Cost and Pricing Data Not Required, in solicitations when cost or pricing data is not required.
